name: docusaurus-plugin-typedoc
description: A Docusaurus v2 plugin to build API documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test:init: rm -rf test/site && npx @docusaurus/init@latest init test/site classic
scripts.test:start: yarn run test:clean && npm run build && cd test/site && npm run clear && npm run start
scripts.test:build-and-serve: yarn run test:clean && npm run build && cd test/site && npm run build && npm run clear && npm run serve
scripts.test:clean: rm -rf test/site/sidebars && rm -rf test/site/docs/api && rm -rf test/site/docs/api-2

author: Thomas Grey
